globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' data: https://www.gstatic.com https://www.google.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https://*; img-src 'self' data: https://*; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://youtube.com;
